languages.text: Ксавьер Калькасар лично встретился с Вольным Торговцем на е{mf|го|е} столичном мире. Столь пристальный интерес к ново{mf|му|й} главе династии фон Валанциус внушает удивление... и трепет.
Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of House von Valancius is intriguing... and disquieting.
languages.original_text: Ксавьер Калькасар лично встретился с Вольным Торговцем на е{mf|го|е} столичном мире. Столь пристальный интерес к ново{mf|му|й} главе династии фон Валанциус внушает удивление... и трепет.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on the Rogue Trader's capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of the von Valancius dynasty is surprising... and disquieting.
Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of House von Valancius is intriguing... and terrifying.
Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on the Rogue Trader's capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of the von Valancius dynasty is surprising... and disquieting.
Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of House von Valancius is intriguing... and disquieting.
Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of House von Valancius is intriguing... and disquieting.
Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of House von Valancius is intriguing... and disquieting.

languages.text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎前往行商浪人的首都世界，亲自与行商浪人见了一面。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的新任领袖引起了大审判官如此强烈的兴趣，这件事情既令人好奇……又让人不安。
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of House von Valancius is intriguing... and disquieting.

traits.locale_text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎前往行商浪人的首都世界，亲自与行商浪人见了一面。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的新任领袖引起了审判长如此强烈的兴趣，这件事情既令人好奇……又让人不安。

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar en personne a rencontré {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sur son monde-capitale. Le fait même qu'il porte un tel intérêt à {mf|celui|celle} qui a repris les rênes de la maison von Valancius est intriguant... pour ne pas dire inquiétant.
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of House von Valancius is intriguing... and disquieting.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar en personne a rencontré {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sur son monde-capitale. Le fait même qu'il porte un tel intérêt à {mf|celui|celle} qui a repris les rênes de la maison von Valancius est intriguant... pour ne pas dire inquiétant.

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar se ha reunido personalmente con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en su mundo capital. Su interés por {mf|el|la} nuev{mf|o|a} líder de la casa von Valancius es intrigante... y perturbador.
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of House von Valancius is intriguing... and disquieting.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar se ha reunido personalmente con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en su mundo capital. Su interés por {mf|el|la} nuev{mf|o|a} líder de la casa von Valancius es intrigante... y perturbador.

languages.text: ザビエル・カルカサルは首都惑星で自由開拓者と私的に面会した。そのようなフォン・ヴァランシウス家の新たな頭領への強い関心は興味深く…不安をかきたてるものでもあった。
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of House von Valancius is intriguing... and disquieting.

traits.locale_text: ザビエル・カルカサルは首都惑星で自由開拓者と私的に面会した。そのようなフォン・ヴァランシウス家の新たな頭領への強い関心は興味深く…不安をかきたてるものでもあった。

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar traf {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} persönlich auf {mf|dessen|deren} Hauptwelt. Ein solches Interesse am neuen Oberhaupt des Hauses Valancius ist interessant ... und beunruhigend.
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of House von Valancius is intriguing... and disquieting.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar traf {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} persönlich auf {mf|dessen|deren} Hauptwelt. Ein solches Interesse am neuen Oberhaupt des Hauses Valancius ist interessant ... und beunruhigend.

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar ve Hür Tacir, başdünyada bir araya geldi. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun von Valancius Hanesi'nin liderine duyduğu özel ilgi merak uyandırıcı ve... Endişe verici.
languages.original_text: Xavier Calcazar personally met with the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} capital world. Such keen interest in the new head of House von Valancius is intriguing... and disquieting.
